target_description: become a net zero company by 2050 or sooner, and to help the world get to net zero
interim_target: Reduce Scope 1 and 2 operational emissions by 50% by 2030 compared to 2019 baseline; reduce the carbon intensity of products sold by 15-20% by 2030

target_description: becoming carbon neutral across its entire supply chain and product life cycle
interim_target: carbon neutrality for its global corporate operations by 2020
